articles.title: NASA reveals how a powerful solar storm DESTROYED Elon Musk led SpaceX satellites - HT Tech
articles.description: In February 2022, a solar storm event destroyed 40 Starlink satellites, shortly after a SpaceX mission launched them into the upper atmosphere. NASA has now shed more light into how it happened.
articles.content: The Earth has been plagued by solar storm events this year. And while we have seen some really intense storms, including a terrifying G4-class geomagnetic storm last week, none have had the destructi… [+2143 chars]
